website_summaries.verdict: Easy-to-use golf cart cover that you can put in place in a hurry. Comes at a reasonable price.
pros: Long zipper on the back of the cover simplifies the process of putting on and taking off the cart cover
Includes air vents to encourage airflow and to prevent moisture from building up underneath the cover
Elastic band along bottom keeps cover in place
Will fit either two-person or four-person golf carts
cons: Too thin to stand up to harsh weather conditions
Won't fit all golf cart models

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great golf cart cover. Easy to put on and take off. Made well and the material is great, durable and still light weight for ease of handling. Fits very nicely to cove the cart well. Great price I feel right on point. I would recommend this to family/friends. I received a discount in return for my honest, unbiased review. Click Yes if this review has helped you. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma W

customer_reviews.title: Good golf cart cover for the money
customer_reviews.text: A good cover for your golf cart. I have a 1998 Yamaha gas golf cart with the rear facing seats. We keep this at our campsite and use it to ride around. Golf cart is kept under a covered carport, so this cover is used to keep animals, leaves, etc out. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Papakevin

customer_reviews.title: Over the Top
customer_reviews.text: This cart cover exceeded my expectations. The fabric is heavier than I expected and the workmanship is above average. It has weathered several rains and some wind without coming off. I would recommend this without any reservations.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Mama

customer_reviews.title: Material is of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Material is of good quality...however the measurements were totally incorrect! I have a two seater golf cart and this was supposed to fit a four seater...yet it barely fits over the fold up rear end. Not worth my time to return as this is for my Havasu place..done deal. Tied the back end off with bungee cords which was difficult to do. Very odd. I'll try to provide a pick when I'm there over the holiday weekend. Delivery was quick as always with prime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Fits
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to protect my cart and to keep it clean. It is well made and fit perfectly. My only issue was with the snap at the bottom of the zipper. The elastic that holds the cover snug around the base of the cover really pulls the cover tight. It works so well that the snap does not hold and this made the zipper difficult to close. Our neighbor has a cart with a cover and that cover has a plastic snap buckle in place of the snap. Once I added the buckle everything was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I use my golf cart cover every day. I like the gray color and I like how easily I can put it on the cart. I have a two seater golf cart that I had a back seat added to it. The fit is pretty good. I have to pull the back of it together to get it to zip almost all the way down. It really keeps my cart clean. I haven't had to wash my cart for a couple of months. I just dust it. The cover seems to keep the cart really clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki J Harding

customer_reviews.title: Not up to the task long term
customer_reviews.text: Initially, the cover seemed fine, though the zipper wasn't as quality as the previous cover I had on my Yamaha 2 seat G1 that lasted more than 2 years. This one has barely made it 9 months and already started to disintegrate in several places. I wouldn't recommend this brand, find a thicker cover that will last longer. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: A cover for a 4 person Yamaha golf cart
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits our Yamaha cart which has seating for 4 and a foot platform for the back seats. It is a snug fit, but that keeps it on the cart when it is windy. It is easy for one person to remove. A second person will be appreciated to put the cover on the cart.
customer_reviews.author: jemorti

customer_reviews.title: One Slight Oversight!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cart cover worked great EXCEPT for the bungie tie around the bottom. One end easily slipped inside the track and we could not retrieve it. We used our bungie cords but it would have been easier if you designed a stop on each end to stop the 2 ends of the bungie cords from disappearing when you tried to pull the bottom of the cover around the bottom of the cart.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Sayles

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It is super easy to use, sturdy, and good looking. We have a two seat golf cart that has been baking in the Floridian sun because the garage is occupied by two cars. Needless to say that the rain and humidity started to get to it. Now it has its own little garage. I will just by a bungee cord to attach to the holes on each side so I give it a little bit of extra security when the winds pick up soon. Love it and can only recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie83

customer_reviews.title: not as good as I thought
customer_reviews.text: my cart must be bigger cause it is tight on it, also it is not sewn well there are a lot of threads all over this thing, not as good as I thought may last one year. the good thing is I sew for a living so.... I will be fixing it I bet.
customer_reviews.author: 3HappyCampers

customer_reviews.title: Cover is good quality, and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Cover is good quality , and fast shipping , They only thing and i beleive is my mistake , i have a 4 seat cart , i think i order the 2 seat cover , so the cover dont fit good , be carefull when you order, to order the good size. I recommand that cover
customer_reviews.author: Rene Gagne

customer_reviews.title: The golf cart cover fabric held up well over the ...
customer_reviews.text: The golf cart cover fabric held up well over the past year - especially compared to less expensive covers. The snap at the base of the zipper, however, did corrode and disintegrate within the year. The snap is close to the ground and is exposed to a lot of moisture from the dirt so probably should be stainless steel. However, the company did stand behind their one-year warranty and replaced the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect golf cart cover from weather
customer_reviews.text: I like the material that it was made out of and the perfect fit. Rating the warmth and sheerness is non applicable since the item I purchased a golf cart cover for storage. I am well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: da

customer_reviews.title: only lasted 3 summer
customer_reviews.text: snap rusted and shredded after the 3rd summer (was indoors in the winter).
customer_reviews.author: Terri - Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the heft of the material. We'll see how long it lasts in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Fit my club car nice and snug
customer_reviews.text: Fit my club car nice and snug, zipper in the back works well to close it up. Material seems to be strong, its not thick like canvas but is easy to get on and off and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Reader of History

customer_reviews.title: Good but fit issues
customer_reviews.text: If you have a footrest on the back for passengers, this cover doesn't fit very well. It will stretch and can cover everything, but you need to be really careful. I like it, but I doubt it will last for long because of this.
customer_reviews.author: MF Marlowe Family

customer_reviews.title: Snap doesnt hold...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, marine-type material. Fits my cart ok but it secures with a snap that doesn't hold very well. I'll be returning this purchase. I highly doubt it would last a winter in the Pacific NW.
customer_reviews.author: julie hovland

customer_reviews.title: the cover not what i thought it would be cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: the cover not what i thought it would be cheap material do not think its going to last long hate when you do not get what you think you are buying thought it was heavy canvas not cheap material
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: First one I got the snap that holds zipper in frayed and fell off within a day. Returned and new one had same issue. I used a lighter to make it hold better and taped it. The only reason I am not giving it a 1 star is the actual material is good. But overall I am very disappointed that I have to fix a returned item that had the same exact issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It seems to made well and fits easily over the cart
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described although it is shorter than shown. It covers to the top of the wheels. Not a problem. It seems to made well and fits easily over the cart.
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Good cover, however it does not go all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good cover, however it does not go all the way down to cover the wheels like the photo shows. It,only covers the body. I have a 4 person cart with the short roof so it should actually be longer than the photo
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: This did not fit the 4 person cart as advertised it was not long enough to reach and properly cover the cart. Can not comment on the durability right now as we have not returned to see how it’s holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Marlyn A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: The cover was easy to install and fit well mainly I needed it in a hurry it was delivered in plenty of time.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Smith Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Fits our go ft cart like a glove. Product shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: debra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product but if your cart is lifted it may take two people to install.
customer_reviews.author: Darryll D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: A great value and amazing Amazon next day delivery. So pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Barry K Mabus

customer_reviews.title: ... and we were able to put it on fairly easily.
customer_reviews.text: It fit our cart well and we were able to put it on fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Caroline

customer_reviews.title: so so
customer_reviews.text: A little small for the ezgo TxT48 It does not zip down all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: No Reason Not to Give 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on Club Car - seems to be an excellent value at this price point. It's just a basic weather proof cover that serves it's purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: excellent cover, just a little big for my cart
customer_reviews.text: excellent cover, just a little big for my cart. Goes on and off with ease. So far very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover only problem is my unit has the dump body on the back. So I had to return it otherwise a good cover for the money. Not too thick , not too thin.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Malerba

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Holds up well, I have it at the beach, easy to take on and off by myself
customer_reviews.author: amy clement

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: material is thicker and a better quality than I expected. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jaci

customer_reviews.title: fit perfect almost like it was a custom cover
customer_reviews.text: We have a cart with an added back seat, fit perfect almost like it was a custom cover. Heavy duty and high quality, Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Maine_fisherman

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and durable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use; covers about half way down the tires, which is perfect. Good looking and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could have been a bit larger but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA L LETTERLY

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Cart Cover!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this cover. It 's easy put on and take off. plus it great for winter storage at our golf shed.
customer_reviews.author: Fluff

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, nice snug taylored fit. Material mich nicer than other covers I've had in the past. Time will tell if it holds up to AZ sun. Neighbor buying one after seeing mine.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Very thin fabric. Fit my golfcart but hope it makes it thru winter.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: great cover -fit and finish is average but better than ...
customer_reviews.text: great cover -fit and finish is average but better than expected for $43 i'm very happy with it and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: gee

customer_reviews.title: The fabric is very rich looking and keeps our golf cart free from dirt and 🌂.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this cover. We used it to cover our golf cart and got a lot of complicates.
customer_reviews.author: Reba Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great golf cart cover
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and fits like a glove even with rear seat safety bar. Very happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mashnee Flats

customer_reviews.title: Snug Fit
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits my 2 seat Club Car very snug. That may not be a bad thing so wind will not blow it off like my last cover.
customer_reviews.author: Heybaile

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased it's this cover
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased it's this cover. We have a 2 person Club Car and the cover fits perfect. The quality of the fabric , zipper and elastic is great, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Twitty

customer_reviews.title: No postage paid return
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but beware if you have to return this item for any reason no postage paid return. cost me 20.00 to return.
customer_reviews.author: kevin botelho

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Don't know longevity but looks well made. Seams are tight and fits really well following the chart!
customer_reviews.author: PFJ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with this cover, but I had to return it because it doesn't fit my "raised cart"
customer_reviews.author: Julie Reigle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It fit my Easy Go golf cart really well, went on easy. Stays on even in stormy weather
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Tiinker

customer_reviews.title: so easy to get on and off
customer_reviews.text: it covers the whole cart including the wheels. this is an important item for here in Arizona. so easy to get on and off. perfect thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality. Very thin material
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2 week in south Fla. Not worth the price. Very thin and after two weeks it fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: TAY

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it fits great. Just don't know how long the zipper snap ...
customer_reviews.text: The snap is too tight and it is hard to unsnap . The material will tear if you don't watch what you are doing. Otherwise it fits great. Just don't know how long the zipper snap will last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Working for me
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover. We have a rear seat that creates a tight fit. It is not clear from the description if this cover is designed to work with a rear seat or not.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Not only Did the package arrive on time but it was sturdy material and I know it's going to last in this summer Sun
customer_reviews.author: Eloy Gonzalez Jr

customer_reviews.title: broken zipper
customer_reviews.text: please advise..the zipper on the cover I purchased several months ago has broken when trying to close it up..will you rcompany replace this since it does have a years warranty ?
customer_reviews.author: RNpatriot

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: do not like the storage bag being attached to the cover
customer_reviews.author: chris guenthner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality golf cover and fits 4 passenger easy go well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really a pretty nice cover even though it is a little thin
customer_reviews.author: T. Ammon

customer_reviews.title: Fits just as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Fits club car with back seat and a short roof perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Archie

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover for the money. Seems to be a very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell
customer_reviews.text: Just received it. Can't really tell how it works as I put it on yesterday. For now, it fits well.
customer_reviews.author: SHerrgard

customer_reviews.title: I expected a better product
customer_reviews.text: The zipper on back would not do down and could not fasten the button down.
customer_reviews.author: Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: very nice cover for the price. Shipping was excellent and would purchase again. Fit for my ezgo was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: luckygirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 1980 Club Car Great. Made of pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Migut

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very good quality. I would certainly buy it again if I needed to.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: A good value to keep the golf cart from the dust in Arizona.
customer_reviews.author: Don Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cover and fits our Yamaha golf cart perfect! Very happy with this selection.
customer_reviews.author: ann dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect golf cart cover!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this item for our golf cart!! We removed golf club straps/holders and installed a bench seat. Fits perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Decent cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: A little thinner than I expected and some loose threads. 4 person fits perfect on 06 club car precedent with rear seat kit. Fast shipping

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Club Car perfect, just as advertised, Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.author: Brian Conway

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Durable fabric that fits perfect for our 4 passenger golf cart

customer_reviews.title: Protect my cart from rain and wind blown sand
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and does the job of keeping my cart clean and dry

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Cover is not even 1 year olg and already the fabric is ripping/shredding, very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast arrival date. It was everything they said it was and reasonably priced....how could you ask for more?

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised by the quality of this cover compared to its low price. Great buy!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like material and time will tell how it handles a hot humid Florida summer.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice cover. works well for my 2010 club car.

customer_reviews.title: Golf cart cover
customer_reviews.text: Cover fit just right. I'll know if it really worked when I get back here to Palm Springd in Oct.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, Did not fit our cart
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, Did not fit our golf cart. Stated that it was for a four seater with an extended roof, not so! Had to return it for a refund 😥

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: its light and in a breeze hard to get on also hard to tell inside from outside, so you might have to put on more then once to get it right,,, item came in 2 days very fast,,

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great cover fits golf cart perfect and has held up through wind and rain.

product_meta.title: SUMMATES Golf Cart Cover, Fits Yamaha Drive, EZ Go,Club Car Precedent,Color Tan, Dark Gray
product_meta.description:
Summates 

Summates has been dedicated into the Outdoor and Water leisure market for over 10 years. We have steadily increased our investments in design and product development to make sure we are providing the most innovative, beneficial products on the market today. We strive to give our customers the best combination of quality and affordability. Your satisfaction in our products is our number one priority. 

Product Description 


Provides protection for most types of Golf Carts.Fits 2-Person carts up to 95"L x 42"W x 62"H; Fits 4-Person carts up to 106"L x 47"W x 62"H.
Durable fabric to protect your golf car against bad weather 
Rear air vents reduce wind lofting and inside moisture buildup 
Easy-on golf cart cover with a rear access zipper for easy entry 
Elastic cord sewn into the hem for snug fit 
one year limited warranty
feature_bullets: Easy-on golf cart cover with a rear access zipper for easy entry
Rear air vents reduce wind lofting and inside moisture buildup
Elastic cord sewn into the hem for snug fit
2-Person cart fits up to 95"L x 42"W x 62"H; 4-Person cart fits up to 106"L x 47"W x 62"H
